member.name: T:MASICResultsMerger.DartIdPreprocessor
member.summary: Transforms a Dataset_PlusSICStats.txt data file from MASICResultsMerger into a format compatible with DART-ID Dart-ID Manuscript: PLoS Computational Biology. 2019 Jul 1;15(7):e1007082 https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/31260443

members.member:
This class merges the contents of a tab-delimited peptide hit results file (e.g. from SEQUEST, X!Tandem, or MS-GF+) with the corresponding MASIC results files, appending the relevant MASIC stats for each peptide hit result
------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Written by Matthew Monroe for the Department of Energy (PNNL, Richland, WA) Program started November 26, 2008
E-mail: matthew.monroe@pnnl.gov or matt@alchemistmatt.com Website: https://omics.pnl.gov/ or https://panomics.pnnl.gov/ -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: T:MASICResultsMerger.MASICResultsMerger.eResultsProcessorErrorCodes
member.summary: Error codes specialized for this class

member.name: P:MASICResultsMerger.MASICResultsMerger.CreateDartIdInputFile
member.summary: When true, create a DART-ID compatible file from the Dataset_PlusSICStats.txt file

member.name: P:MASICResultsMerger.MASICResultsMerger.SeparateByCollisionMode
member.summary: When true, a separate output file will be created for each collision mode type; this is only possible if a _ReporterIons.txt file exists

member.name: P:MASICResultsMerger.MASICResultsMerger.ScanNumberColumn
member.summary: For the input file, defines which column tracks scan number; the first column is column 1 (not zero)

member.name: M:MASICResultsMerger.MASICResultsMerger.GetErrorMessage
member.summary: Get the current error state, if any
member.returns: Returns an empty string if no error

member.name: M:MASICResultsMerger.MASICResultsMerger.ProcessFile(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.param: If true, reset the error code
member.returns: True if success, False if failure

member.name: P:MASICResultsMerger.ProcessedFileInfo.OutputFiles
member.summary: The Key is the collision mode and the value is the output file path

member.name: P:MASICResultsMerger.ScanStatsData.ReporterIonData
member.summary: Comes from _ReporterIons.txt file (Nothing if the file doesn't exist)

member.name: P:MASICResultsMerger.ScanStatsData.ScanStatsFileName
member.summary: Comes from _ReporterIons.txt file (Nothing if the file doesn't exist)
